ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Digest Number 463
ygData.msgSnippet: Date: Thu, 25 Apr 2002 18:44:11 -0000 From: muaddib_1974  Subject: Hello I am new Hello, How is everyone today? I am new to this
ygData.messageBody:
Date: Thu, 25 Apr 2002 18:44:11 -0000
   From: "muaddib_1974" <muaddib1974@...>
Subject: Hello I am new

Hello,
  How is everyone today? I am new to this club and to EverQuest. I am
trying to learn things about EverQuest. Anythnig you can tell me will
help. How can you scream, etc.... My name is David, I am 27, live in
Oklahoma.
David
 
 
Hi, welcome to the game.  A few resources you should check out are Allakhazam http://everquest.allakhazam.com and everlore http://www.everlore.com and Castersrealm http://www.castersrealm.com even if you aren't a caster.
 
There are other sites linked off  those pages that you can look for, and I'm sure others have more links for ya.
 
Another thing you should do is look at the manual very well and read the manual in your Everquest directory on your computer (they are different).  Alot  of basic stuff is covered in those. 
 
What server are you on? What is your character name, and class?
 
Good luck
Bebinn Maolcataig
36 Woodelf Ranger, Council of Truth
Bristlebane Server
